resources.string: Really cool app to discover new software!

I have found a really cool app to discover and find new software.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tundem.alternativefindr

Prefer websites? Click here: http://alternativeto.net
(Found with the great alternativeto.net Android Client!)

Copyright

http://penz.tundem.com
Twitter - Google Plus

Tundem Media Group - http://tundem.com

About This App

I do lots of creative stuff in my freetime, including Android projects.

alternativeto.net is one of the first sources, if i am searching for new apps, for a while now.

After a quick search on the Goolge Play Store, i decided to make a complete client for alternativeto.net, including all techniques i learned the last few months.

The whole app features the awesome new Holo-Design from Google, with some small modifications.

Used Libraries

One very important criterium for me is always the downcompatiblity of my apps.

To be able to offer the app for Android Devices lower than Android v4.0.4 (Ice Cream Sandwhich) i decided to use the great libraries from Jake Wharton (His gplus profile!).
I used the following projects:
ActionBarSherlock - actionbarsherlock.com
ViewPagerIndicator - viewpagerindicator.com
NineOldAndroids - nineoldandroids.com

To offer a second method to refresh the ListView i used this library:
Pull-To-Refresh - github.com/chrisbanes/Android-PullToRefresh

I also used these libraries:
WebImage - github.com/wrapp/WebImage-Android
ACRA - code.google.com/p/acra
Gson - code.google.com/p/google-gson

About AlternativeTo.net

We have one mission: helping you find the right software for your computer, mobile phone or tablet. Our main focus is to give you alternatives to software you already know and want to replace.

Based on our users recommendations we list great alternatives to the applications you want to replace. By joining the site you can participate in the process of making these recommendations better, so please join in!

About the authors

Ola - Hello! I take care of the development and other tech stuff on AlternativeTo. - twitter.com/#!/_olaj

Markus - Hello I am a Mac, with a serious App Store addiction. Taking care of the design, social media and business stuff. - twitter.com/#!/raawmarkus
